summary: PROBLEM STARTING 2001 CHEVY IMPALA IN EXTREMELY WARM WEATHER.  ALL LIGHTS ON DASHBOARD LIGHT UP AND CAR WILL NOT START.  REPLACED THE BATTERY THE FIRST TIME IT HAPPENED IN FALL.  REPLACED THE ALTERNATOR.  REPLACED THE WIRES TO THE BATTERY. RESEARCHED AND FOUND THAT IT WAS THE PASSLOCK SECURITY SYSTEM, FOR WHICH NUMEROUS PEOPLE ARE HAVING SIMILAR PROBLEMS.   HAVE BEEN STUCK AT WORK PARKING LOT IN EVENING, AT GAS STATION AFTER FILLING UP AND OTHER LOCATIONS, USUALLY WHEN I'M ALONE.  WILL NOT ALLOW MY SON OR DAUGHTER TO DRIVE VEHICLE.  DEFINITELY A SAFETY ISSUE. *TR
